text: Motion

Koito-chan... you nervous?
It'll be alright.

T-There's...!
There's no problem at all...!
Motion
Motion
AD

──aaaand that's a wrap for the rehearsals!
If we can have you off the stage please, noctchill-san～
Eh? Already?

Huh～?
We didn't even get to the bridge yet...

Yeah, okay, move along, please.
The next performers are lining up.
Motion
Program Director

──Excuse me, sorry. Can we have a little bit more time,
just for our check of the acoustics and whatnot──

Whoa, nononono, live singing is out of the question.
We're doing playback.

Sorry, I know I'm barging in.
...You mean we'll be lip syncing?

Yeah... uh, you weren't seriously expecting to sing live
here, right!? No way!

Just look at her. She can barely even make a peep, right?
It's taking all she's got just for the choreography!
Motion
Motion
Motion

I-I'm very sorry...!
F-For for how... earlier, I...
Motion

I-I'll be fine next time, so...!
Um, for the live──

I mean, you're not toe to toe with L'Antica-chan,
are you. We didn't get live performance staff, anyway.
Motion

But, that's...!
No, even so, if we could've just been consulted
about this──

Oh, and Asakura-kun, right? She's gonna be the main
focus for the cameras, both for the song and talk.

Alriight.
Gonna do my best.
Motion

──None of this is what we've been told. Contrarily,
this was all we were going to get at best.

Aha～
Looks like things aren't looking up～...

E-Even though we've done our best...
to train and be able to sing and dance properly...
